name: Seeds of Fate (Abby VioletBlue)
description:
Please Note: I do not own the rights of the game, scenarios, or music. This is just Import I downloaded.

You play as Van, (The Warrior), with her friend Lina (the Huntress) in an adventure like no other! The Empire is on the hunt for a power known as "The Godseed". As you advance to defeat monsters and power up Your heroes, the adventure will grow within Lina... Literally!

What will happen next? well... 

That for you to find out!
